text: Hangar 18 may refer to: * Hangar 18, a hangar at the Wright-Patterson Air Force Base in Ohio purported to contain UFO (Unidentified Flying Object) technology * Hangar 18 (band), an American hip hop group * Hangar 18 (film), a 1980 science fiction film * "Hangar 18" (song), a song by Megadeth from Rust in Peace * "Hangar 18, Area 51", a song by Yngwie Malmsteen from the 1999 album Alchemy * Hangar 18, an Alienware HD media server * Hangar 18, a DLC map for Call of Duty: Black Ops
title: Hangar 18
